content.body:
Is anybody familiar with “provisional navigation”? Is it maybe a synonym for “provisional load”?

I had thought “provisional navigation” might be some WebKit-specific thing — or maybe iOS-specific — but I now see mentions of it the Blink sources also (in code comments).

* Is anybody familiar with “provisional navigation”? Is it maybe a synonym for “provisional load”?

I had thought “provisional navigation” might be some WebKit-specific thing — or maybe iOS-specific — but I now see mentions of it in the Blink sources also (in code comments).

m.new_content.body:
Is anybody familiar with “provisional navigation”? Is it maybe a synonym for “provisional load”?

I had thought “provisional navigation” might be some WebKit-specific thing — or maybe iOS-specific — but I now see mentions of it in the Blink sources also (in code comments).

content.body: zcorpan: after speaking with Domenic I'm leaning towards keep the current proposal using `href`....  it's not more confusing wrt the `base` element so consistent with the notion of an "internal link"
content.formatted_body: zcorpan: after speaking with Domenic I'm leaning towards keep the current proposal using href.... it's not more confusing wrt the base element so consistent with the notion of an "internal link"

content.body: I think it's OK if people who use the `base` element need to take extra care with this new feature
content.formatted_body: I think it's OK if people who use the base element need to take extra care with this new feature

content.body: .... also we'll support `<a name>` just as we do for other internal links
content.formatted_body: .... also we'll support <a name> just as we do for other internal links
